data.actual_result: The slider bar moves back and front and flickers, making it difficult to set a user limit
data.expected_result: You should be able to easily adjust the limit using the slider bar
data.short_description: Slider bar jumps about/flickers when adjusting the user limit in the voice channel settings [iOS 10 only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server in which you own or have the manage channels permission - Hold on one of the voice channels and tap on Edit Channel - Drag the slider bar button back and forth in the User Limit section
